entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
